website_summaries.verdict: The Panther Series cover is compatible with most flat panel sets, and works with wall mounts and stands.
pros: Fabric has high elasticity to help fit panel size
3-way rear flap adjusts to TV mount designs
cons: No bottom panel to fully protect TV
Difficult to put into place on TV

customer_reviews.title: Great for TVs that have ZERO protection outdoors
customer_reviews.text: First, let me just say that we did not buy an "outdoor TV" for our deck. I heard bad things about them, and they're about a bazillion dollars. Instead, we got a cheap, super light TV from Sam's and got this awesome cover for it. There is no cover over the deck, and not even a ledge over where the TV is mounted. We have used this TV cover for over a year and it's worked perfectly. We do bring the TV in when it's hailing outside or when it's below freezing, but that's just to play it safe. And because we got a light TV, that's no problem at all for us!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Open bottom
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product seems nice enough. However had I notice when buying it has an open bottom I would have chosen a different one. It will take care of your TV in normal to moderate rain conditions, but if there is high wind this may come off. Just two Velcro straps hold it on at the open bottom. I ended up purchasing another brand that encloses all the way so I don't have to worry about wind, water, or bugs getting in/on the TV from underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value. Very well made. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this great cover on our outdoor patio TV this last weekend. Fits like perfection on the new Samsung 8000 series 65" TV. I used a dual arm sturdy articulating bracket, so I could pull the bracket out from the wall to get the rear covered and secure as well. This cover had the necessary cutouts for the dual arm bracket, so it's a winner! Good looking cover as well. Great value. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: This fit my Toshiba 55" TV (old 1080p tv with large bezels). The fabric is thick and it has a nice slot it the back. My only recommendation for the design would be to create slits to put little rods so that I can put it on my tv that is hanging a little high. This would save me from having to get a step ladder every time.
customer_reviews.author: ATM

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: I suppose that I should give this a 5 star rating. It does everything it claims! Only reason for not giving a 5 star is that it’s not 100% protection. Then again, with the variety of TV’s out there, you would have to have a cover special made to be perfect and I’m sure that the cost would not be as fair as this cover!! Our outside TV (not rated for outside) is in a covered area (patio). So, I am 100% confident in the protection of this cover. Lots of Velcro and flaps to secure it. Yes, I would recommend and I would certain purchase again if needed
customer_reviews.author: Spirithdmc

customer_reviews.title: This cover is perfect. Don't look anywhere else
customer_reviews.text: We were sure this cover would be cheap and we'd be sending it back, because it was so much cheaper than the other covers we were looking to buy. WRONG!! This cover is perfect. Don't look anywhere else, order this. We were skeptical and so glad we went with this cover. It's very well made. There are velcro straps and strips exactly were they need to be. We have a 65 inch tv which is at the high end of measurements this fits. The fit is right on. I would definitely recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Not 360 degree coverage
customer_reviews.text: Decent material and fairly easy to use--but clearly not 360 degree coverage as described. The bottom is wide open and only has two skinny velcro straps. If you want to cover your tv while spraying a hose, this product would give me no comfort for the aforementioned reason. Will be returning and trying to find a different one that actually covers my entire tv.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, the cover fit the TV very well and so far has been great at protecting it from the elements and gives the outdoor television a professional look. The cover has been outside on the TV for about three weeks and when we take the cover off the screen and all looks great! The remote holder has been super convenient to keep the remotes put away from the elements and our two dogs. The only negative thing about it would be that the bottom does not seal very well as there is only two straps to hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hilyer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for covering our outdoor TV. The only thing I would change is to have more closures on the bottom. There are only 2 velcro strips to close the bottom. It needs at least 2-3 more to completely close the bottom so no dust,etc gets in. I bought some velcro strips and applied them, and it worked great. I would recommend this product. It fit great and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: 8016liz

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv cover
customer_reviews.text: Really like his cover! Bought to put over tv in garage to keep dust, dirt and sawdust off of it and it works perfectly. Item came quickly and was easy to install. My husband is considering adding a sound bar mount under the tv and the Velcro tabs across the bottom would allow for that without needing to buy a bigger or longer cover.
customer_reviews.author: M3 CEO

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for a very reasonable price.  Just what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 42" plasma I have on my screen porch perfectly. Mine is on a stand, but the back has Velcro openings that allow this cover to work with wall mount also. Also has a closable pouch on back for a good size remote. I was very pleased with the thickness and quality of the cover. it has Velcro straps on the bottom front that attaché to the back of the cover to keep it from blowing off in the wind. I highly recommend this cover based on quality and price. And as always delivered at no cost in 2 days because I am a Prime member:-)
customer_reviews.author: Bill Folk

customer_reviews.title: Lost 2 tvs from this
customer_reviews.text: It is pouring rain now and my new tv is covered. This tv is only. Couple of weeks old. The other tv died and I figured it was the life of the tv. I just felt the inside of the tv and it is soaked. The water is coming right through the mesh and saturating the tv. This cover is less than a year old. I doubled checked to make sure it was tight and it was my improperly put on but it is on perfect...water is just saturating right through it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Reineke

customer_reviews.title: I've used this outdoor cover on a normal (inside rated) ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this outdoor cover on a normal (inside rated) LED TV outside for about a year now and i haven't had any issues at all. Just make sure the velco is all sealed up after every use and you should be OK. I actually installed some industrial velcro to the bottom of this cover just to seal it from all areas & sprayed the entire thing with a marine grade fabric guard to protect it during storms. If you do the above you should be able to get many years out of an indoor rated tv OUTSIDE!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and fits fine
customer_reviews.text: my newly installed TV under covered patio. I was more concerned about the dirt and dust flying around her in So Cal vs the Rain!!! (we wish!). easy to fit and put on. I added some of my own velcro strips on the underside to secure it from the dust and dirt ( esp as my gardener blows everything around also). I recommend. I have a 58" and I still had room - was going to try and fit around the sound bar I mounted against the wall but that didn't work into the "plan".no biggie
customer_reviews.author: Carol O.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a great price. I bought this for our TV on our back patio and it works perfectly. The price is what stood out to me the most because so many of the covers are much more than this one. It fits our TV perfectly and the cover is designed to go over and around all of the cords in the back of the TV. My husband was afraid that it would not cover the back of the TV as it should and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are not accurate whatsoever. Also, this has an open bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Junk! The material is lightweight at best. The size is NOT accurate whatsoever. Ordered for a 50” tv and it looks like it’s made for a 55”. There’s so much play in the canvas material. Also, pictures in the description show a closed bottom. This has an open bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: My ONLY recommendation would be to flip the bottom retention ...
customer_reviews.text: My ONLY recommendation would be to flip the bottom retention strips so that they come FROM the back TO the front. It only makes sense. I hope the manufacturer sees this and thinks about it. The TV is up against the wall when they go the way they are you have to hunt around blindly for the Velcro. Simple fix if it is gone in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Randy L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor tv on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Got the tv cover for our outdoor tv. We could not afford one of the expensive outdoor TVs, so we settled for a regular LED. Our tv is in our screened in porch. So it is covered from weather for the most part. The day after I installed the tv (with the cover) we got a hard rain that blew into our deck. The cover kept the tv dry and it worked flawlessly after the storm. It actually stormed for the next 3 days (trees down everywhere). If you are looking at doing a outdoor tv on a budget, this cover is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality material, great cover!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a second for my second patio TV this year. They are made of a quality canvas and hold up pretty well. The seam along the zipper tore of the first after being outside for a year. Partly my fault for just pulling trying to pull the velcro strips apart after being sealed all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, well made
customer_reviews.text: This TV cover worked perfectly. It slips right over the TV, velcro closure works great and the little pocket for the remote control is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ruth Walker

customer_reviews.title: but it worked and we are very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived quickly and was exactly what the description said it was. The tv I ordered it for was a really old big screen tv that we hung out on our patio. The dimensions in the description weren't exactly the size of the tv, but it worked and we are very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to get the velcro attached if it's bulky in the back you'll have to disconnect. Your electrical plugs do attached the Velcro
customer_reviews.author: AKA ali

customer_reviews.title: weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: I live in Hawaii on the waterfront & we get strong Tradewinds & lots of humidity, and some salt spray. I use this cover for my 27" Apple computer. I'll be buying another today for a TV.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Cant believe how good this product is for the price! Its worth way more!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. After searching and searching for a used base for my television, just to find over and over people selling scratched up used bases for $60 to $90. Then I came across this universal base for a fraction of the price, I watched the video and decided it would be good enough. Received faster then advertised and I absolutely love the product! I was a little skeptical that it would work as advertised but it totally out did my expectations. Save yourself the trouble and some cash because this stand is beyond worth your investment, it's worth 3x the price. Good job guys! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Timbo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost but not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: We have a wall mounted TV by the pool and the area is under cover yet open to dampness and heavy wind-blown rain on occasion. So far it's been a good product. Can't beat it at this price! Not heavy duty but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rick in Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, neat little remote holder sewn in on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, neat little remote holder sewn in on the side/back. I don’t know that its 100% perfect for my outdoor setup but I also haven’t had time to do anything other than get up real quick before the storms roll in but I believe there is sufficient coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Rogina Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be Better
customer_reviews.text: I give this a 3 1/2 to maybe a 4. The reason behind it is because these covers are way to loose on my TV. And the velcro straps at the bottom do not even close up the bottom ends nice and secure because the cover is too loose. It would be nice if the bottom strapped in all the way across or even a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cover fits snug and nearly perfect. I would have given it 5 stars but ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 32 in flat screen mounted on a swivel. This cover fits snug and nearly perfect. I would have given it 5 stars but due to the fact that the next size fits 40-48 inches would have been too big of a cover. I just wish it was an inch bigger (in height)
customer_reviews.author: freddy diaz

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for a 55 inch TV and the fit was close to perfect. It fit's snug on the sides
customer_reviews.text: The product is listed as a cover for a 50-52 inch TV. I ordered this for a 55 inch TV and the fit was close to perfect. It fit's snug on the sides, but is still hangs several inches long when in place. The material was actually better than expected. There are several velcro closable openings in the back that allow for a somewhat custom fit in the back around mounts and wires. Very pleased with product. It looks like it will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wilhite

customer_reviews.title: Great tv covers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Fits our 50” Samsung TVs outside perfectly! Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: JSD

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Love the cover. It runs a little big but worked out Great for us, as we have a surge protector on top and a sound bar mounted below. We love that it's long enough to cover the sound bar. The Velcro slit on the back makes it easy to go around awkward wall mounting brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Deena Davis

customer_reviews.title: It is super easy to take on and off and keeps the ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this to cover our tv on the screened porch. It is super easy to take on and off and keeps the TV and cable box dry and protected from blowing rain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a tv in my outdoor bar area
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cover a 32 inch tv that occasionally is left outside under cover in my outdoor bar. I'd be a little nervous leaving it out directly in a pouring rain, but worked perfectly to protect the tv from any rain that may have blown in under the roof. Fit perfectly on a slightly older 32" tv. Might be a little loose on the newer, slimmer models, but I'm sure it would still work fine.
customer_reviews.author: otteck

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is fairly nice, but I was expecting it to be lined with some sort of material that might wick away moisture if it did get in. Also, the bottom doesn't close shut like I've seen on other covers - there are just two velcro straps that essentially just hold the cover onto the tv, but the bottom is not sealed. Having said that, it seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: theMas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: The day I received it the rain came down. Placed the cover over the TV and the next day it was as dry as if it were inside! Love this product! Easy to install and remove! The velcro makes it easy to cover exposed cords!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy E. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My TV is almost flush mounted, so I have to deal with the back flaps a bit while putting on, but the cover fits perfect and looks great. My other covers I've had don't look as good as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice product and would be perfect for a TV mounted ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product and would be perfect for a TV mounted on a stand. My TV is suspended from the ceiling on a pole and this cover is apparently not intended for that use. I had to cut the back flap and attach Velcro strips to make it work. I am surprised that these covers don't come with a clear plastic front that wold allow you to watch the TV without removing the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great to protect the outdoor display but the color faded ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great to protect the outdoor display but the color faded in only a few months. Plus there should be a better option or flap to protect the bottom of the display.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lockett

customer_reviews.title: It simply does the assigned tast rather well.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, but extremely protective (we have cats). Hint: Look st the ACTUAL measurements (in description, not title) when ordering. They tend to run a little large.
customer_reviews.author: Mongo666

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor cover!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I don't have an outdoor tv yet so I'm using a standard indoor tv and this thing has done an amazing job keeping it safe for as long as I can. My backyard typically gets extremely dusty but when I take the cover off, I don't see a spec of dust. The bottom part does not close so that says a lot about this item. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pascual

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a little easy to remove and replace over TV hanging on bracket
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Wish it was a little easy to remove and replace over TV hanging on bracket. A little tough to get on properly over bracket. But, it appears to be protecting the TV well against the elements so far (but it's only been a month).
customer_reviews.author: jennolte

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor tv cover
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Has velcro tabs at bottom to wrap tightly and opening in the back for the connections. Has just enough looseness to get on and off a 55 inch tv easily and seal it up from the elements. Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Chris p

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't planned on this purchase but my husband apparently did. Now I would recommend it to anyone who has a television outdoors, it's a GOOD QUALITY product. I'm very happy with this purchase, thanks honey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too loose!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product looks like lose fitting clothes. I get on my kids for that and I have television that look worse..
customer_reviews.author: Brian cook

customer_reviews.title: PANTHER - easy to fit over
customer_reviews.text: Outdoor TV Cover, PANTHER - easy to fit over. Little lose for our 40" (understandable). Velcro straps make it secure and keep a clean look.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: For my TV it fit great. After a big rain storm here in cali ...
customer_reviews.text: Measured my TV ,looked at the dimensions of the cover. and deemed that it will fit. Do not assume. That the cover Will fit. Measure your TV. For my TV it fit great. After a big rain storm here in cali it worked great and my TV still works
customer_reviews.author: FERNANDO PRADO

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality! Fits nicely over my 50" tv the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality! Fits nicely over my 50" tv the back is even cut for the mount and cords with a Velcro flap so all components are protected. There's even a pocket tot the remote,. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: PATRICE

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 65" TV just fine. It's not super tight which is a benefit in taking it off and putting it on. Nonetheless, it isn't floppy and the Velcro will keep it from blowing away. Material appears to be of high quality - only time can say for sure. This appears to be a cover that is worth the price and will adequately protect your TV.
customer_reviews.author: J. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Just got this cover for our TV in our outdoor kitchen. Wanted some thing for weather as well as for looks. This fits the bill. Very well made, easy to put on and take off. We live on the coast, got this because it says it's good for moisture, so will know more after we have it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Disney Grandma

customer_reviews.title: looks nice and fits nice
customer_reviews.text: looks nice and fits nice. will be great for covering my outdoor tv when not in use and to protect it from the elements. It comes in many different sizes so be sure to measure your tv and get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: theaman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the outdoor TV
customer_reviews.text: We use this year round for our 65” tv that we hung outside. Works great and I feel like the tv is protect from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Cover
customer_reviews.text: Great cover! Had a bird build a nest on top so we pulled it off (TV still looked brand new) sprayed it down with the hose, let it dry then threw it back on. Only problem I have seen is the bottom straps rip off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it 5 stars but it's a ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but it's a pain trying to slip this whole cover from the top of the tv. I honestly don't know if it would be easier to slip it on from the bottom or the side. If there was a product that did that, I would try it.
customer_reviews.author: KittyKravitz

customer_reviews.title: It's kind big and stiff. It's a pain getting ...
customer_reviews.text: It's kind big and stiff. It's a pain getting it off and on the TV. It's also has a large depth to it from front to back so it doesn't sit on a thin TV very well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Expected simple and got simply great
customer_reviews.text: exactly what we needed for TV on our screened porch. Nice features includes velcro strips on the back that enable you to go around boxes/bump outs /wires on the back of the TV and still put it on snuggly. Material is thick yet pliable. Does the job nicely. Just make sure you measure twice, order once :-)
customer_reviews.author: bargbet

customer_reviews.title: It's easy enough to take off and put on and it ...
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved our TV outside and needed a cover to keep it out of the weather when not in use. This cover does just what we wanted, keeps our TV covered. It's easy enough to take off and put on and it seems to be of good enough quality to last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too generic!
customer_reviews.text: Design of this cover is too generic and does not fit as many TVs as indicated. Cover does not allow for a mounting bracket unless it is one which is exactly centered and small enough to fit through the small opening on the back of the cover. Looks like a loose bag hanging on the wall. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper D

customer_reviews.title: Stays very secure in the winds and protects tv!
customer_reviews.text: We use the tv cover outside on the patio. There is a roof over the patio, but it is open to all the weather. Rain doesn't really reach it. Stays very secure!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Perry

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Not a tight enough fit ti get wasps etc from wnteting and building nests internally
customer_reviews.author: Vf

customer_reviews.title: Must have for outdoor tv
customer_reviews.text: Fits my tv great. Love the extra pocket on the back for my remote. Keeps sun and dirt from the screen. Adjustable with velcro straps
customer_reviews.author: Justin I

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my application.
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug on the TV and the partition in the back for the stand is fantastic. I have the TV mounted to the ceiling on a fold down mount and this is one of the only weatherproof covers that would have fit properly, as the mount goes up the TV instead of straight back as most do. Another nice feature is the remote pocket on the back, it has a velcro cover to keep the remote in place when I fold the TV to the stored position. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: The product was delivered as promised and I'm not disappointed. The product is well constructed and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered as promised and I'm not disappointed. The product is well constructed and heavy duty. Highly recommend if you have an outdoor tv that needs covering for the weather, but you will have to make sure your tv has some covering from rain. This product will not protect it fro a down pour...
customer_reviews.author: nd99

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: a good cover, but it was a tad too big for my TV and it didn't have any padding on the inside to keep the screen from being scratched if the wind picked up and was blowing on the cover. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: G W

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised. Works great and easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle B.

customer_reviews.title: This cover is perfect for my 55 inch TV mounted outside
customer_reviews.text: This cover is perfect for my 55 inch TV mounted outside. Love the pouch for the remote and the cover wraps around the mount. Complete protection. Handsome too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for a 50" for my 55" and it fit pretty good. Be sure to read the actual sizes ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the cover for a 50" for my 55" and it fit pretty good. Be sure to read the actual sizes of the cover. It doesnt completely play nice with my bracket, so it takes a little massaging...
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: The dimensions were true and it fit very well. ...
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions were true and it fit very well. Our porch is covered so this isn't exposed to direct weather or sunlight so I can't attest to its durability. It works very well for keeping dust and pollen off TV. It's a very hearty fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover convenient pocket and several Velcro straps for ease of use
customer_reviews.author: jimmyj131

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: great quality - fits perfect - wouldn't hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover for my outdoor flat screen TV. The remote holder and quality of the material were high selling points, and the price is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fit nicely over my 55 inch TV with room enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover exceeded my expectations. Fit nicely over my 55 inch TV with room enough for the Joey box. The pockets are very convenient and large enough to hold remotes and cords.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarland 18

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and love the control covered pocket
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and love the control covered pocket. I tend to loose or can't find the remote. Just put it up yesterday. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Greer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, shape and fit, as well as the pockets for accessories. Great item and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Dorthy Cooper-Logan

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV cover for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking cover. I has it installed over a 40" Vizio (36" end to end) and it fits perfectly. The adjustable back panel is a great idea and I was able to fit the cover over my wall mount easily. Thanks Onix Electronics!
customer_reviews.author: ANORM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too sure how well it would protect my tv outside but it really does the job. I live in Houston and with all the recent rain, my tv was not affected. Sitting outside watching a movie now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Just make sure to cover the TV before any rain hits.
customer_reviews.author: James Sombelon

customer_reviews.title: Needed a cover for a TV that we recently installed ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cover for a TV that we recently installed outdoors. We don't get much rain, but we have foggy/overcast mornings. This cover fits our needs as well as our budget. Delivery was also much faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Santos

customer_reviews.title: It makes me feel like it's completely secure from all wind
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly all the way around the tv. It makes me feel like it's completely secure from all wind, debris, and rain!
customer_reviews.author: Magan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover. We use it on our houseboat top ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover.We use it on our houseboat top deck.Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McFaddan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller. Very pleased with this purchase. The fit for our 55" tv is perfect. The rear flaps cover as much of the tv and wiring as possible. The price was great and delivery was extremely fast. Would certainly buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Good Functional TV Cover
customer_reviews.text: Good quality & well constructed. It should last many seasons outside, protected on our screened-in porch. Just wish it had more than two Velcro closure straps on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: LarryFromHendersonville

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This did exactly as we wanted. Fits the TV well and has enough cut-outs to move around the tv.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cover
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad I purchased this cover. My TV faces the sun all afternoon and I think it has saved it. There are straps at the bottom to secure the cover.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with product and vendor. Came quickly and just as described. Looks perfect on our outdoor TV!

customer_reviews.text: Very prompt delivery. Very high quality product. Exactly what I needed for my outdoor RV TV.

customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is awesome and it’s perfect on our patio to protect our TV

customer_reviews.text: Bought rep for Outdoor tv’s,th y work great- Velcro very strong- to unlock do- suggestion? Maybe put a zipper so it’d be easier on removing & attaching.. zipper needs to like a jacket has....????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I've had it in place for a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I've had it in place for a couple weeks. We've had only one day of bad weather (Tornado strength winds and rain), which did not impact the cover (and consequently the TV).
customer_reviews.author: Cliff L.

customer_reviews.title: ... bigger than my tv for a reason and I'm happy with the quality of your product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a few inches bigger than my tv for a reason and I'm happy with the quality of your product. There was however, a 2-3 inch tear at the top of the cover on the seam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it doesn't hang in that nice squared off way like the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: When it is on a relatively new and therefore thin tv, it doesn't hang in that nice squared off way like the picture shows. This doesn't affect the function, but it just doesn't look quite as nice as the stock photo in reality. That being said, it seems thick and study and the pocket for the remote is very handy. I have a tv mounted on the wall (50") on my screened in porch and this has worked well during extreme cold, a roof leak, and general humidity, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for porch tv
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for porch tv that still has a little bit of weather elements to worry about. Easy to put on and take off. Solid material and construction
customer_reviews.author: R. Albers

customer_reviews.title: We bought 2 of these for our outdoor televisions. ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for our outdoor televisions. They serve their purpose. Our TVs are mounted flush to the wall, so all of the flaps on the back are a mute point, but they still work!
customer_reviews.author: HMitchell76

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: works great. can prob fit a little bit larger tv than it says also
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This cover seems to do the job but I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover seems to do the job but I have noticed tiny holes (I know I'm being picky) in the cover. It has rained and even hailed while we had our tv outside but our tv has received no damage yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with the product. I have not tested it against water but it holds up on our windy days. Do not be fooled by the picture, the cleaness of the tucking will definitely not look like a perfect square. It does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Mitchell

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Works well keeping the elements off. 4 out of 5 because pollen can still find its way in due to the bottom not completely sealing off. I would buy it again though...

customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard to handle. Im still using it but honestly a large lawn type trash bag works jusy as well if not bettet

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor TV cover.
customer_reviews.text: I like this TV cover is perfect for my TV, I bough it bigger in case I upgrade to a bigger TV in the future, for now is perfect for my 50 inch HD TV, I recommend this one, is easy to take and put on, it looks great in my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover! Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Great cover! Looks and works great. In the 2 weeks i've had it, there has been a lot of rain AND freezing weather, and the TV is still dry and works like a charm! Item recieved as advertised. Would use seller again!
customer_reviews.author: S. Arya

product_meta.title: KHOMO GEAR Outdoor TV Cover - Panther Series - Universal Weatherproof Protector for 30 - 32 Inch TV - Fits Most Mounts & Brackets
product_meta.description: Size:30'' - 32''| Color:BlackWhether you decide to put a television on a patio, an outdoor deck or by the pool, the KHOMO GEAR TV Cover provides All Season Protection for your valuable Flat Panel TV. Engineered to withstand harsh conditions from the scorching sun to the unforgiving cold. You can rest easy knowing your TV is protected All Year round against dust, insects, UV Rays, ice and condensation with this TV Cover. The KHOMO GEAR TV Cover is made of a unique material that allows it to 'breathe' while keeping out water, wind and moisture. This material will not allow mold and moisture to build up; preventing any damage to your TV that may arise from condensation. The KHOMO GEAR TV Cover is very simple to setup. Just Cover starting from the top and a 3-Way Flap on the rear of the cover easily fits almost every wall mount. A Handy Waterproof Remote Control Pocket is also included in the back.
feature_bullets: ✔️ Make it LOOK GREAT even when the power is not on! Protect your Precious TV with a KHOMO GEAR TV Cover PANTHER Series.
✔️ WIDE COMPATIBILITY: Compatible with LED, LCD and Plasma TVs 30 to 32 inches.
✔️ HEAVY DUTY, DURABLE MATERIAL: All Year Protection! 500x300D High Density Polyester with a High Elasticity, Water Resistant PVC Coating Will Resist Any Weather Conditions
✔️ EASY SET UP: 3 Way Flaps on rear easily fit almost every wall mount plus Waterproof Remote Control Pocket
